duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional patient care while collaborating with healthcare teams and documenting interventions.
Operate on a 4 shifts per week, 12 hours per shift schedule with a contract duration of 3-4 weeks out per compliance tier.
Adhere to compliance regulations including BCLS certification, experience requirements, and license restrictions.
Float within the hospital or to affiliate hospitals nearby, while ensuring charting and compliance with healthcare policies.
Adapt to and fulfill specific job requirements as each unit varies within the hospital or healthcare facility.
Guarantee a seamless and stress-free travel nurse position, enjoying unbeatable support, competitive compensation, housing and travel assistance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing, BCLS Certification, licenses as required (IL and/or MO)
